title: Setup Wizard
subtitle: Automatically detect environment and install OpenClaw
skillDepsDesc: Unlocks more built-in skills after install
advancedDesc: npm registry, VPN tools, and other optional configurations
vpnToolsDesc: Build a virtual LAN after installation for remote device connectivity
zeroTierDesc: Open-source P2P virtual LAN, great for individuals and small teams
zerotierNetworkIdDesc: Auto-join this network after installation. Get it from ZeroTier Central
tailscaleDesc: Zero-config VPN based on WireGuard, simple and easy to use
aiConfigDesc: Configure AI provider and API Key so the gateway can start after installation. You can also skip this and configure later.
apiEndpointDesc: Third-party API endpoint, must be OpenAI API compatible
installHintWithKey: After installation, the model will be configured and gateway will start automatically.
installHintNoKey: No API Key provided. You will need to configure the model in the Editor after installation before the gateway can start.
confirmUninstallMsg:
Are you sure you want to uninstall {cmd}?
This will remove all related files and configurations. This action cannot be undone.
postInstallHint: Use the Usage Wizard for quick setup, or open the Configurator for advanced settings.
nextStepDesc: Please configure AI provider and API Key for OpenClaw to work properly.
nextStepUsageDesc: OpenClaw is installed. The usage wizard will guide you through model setup and your first conversation.
nextStepUsageList: Select AI provider and enter API Key
Send your first message to test
openEditorDesc: Set up AI models and channels in the editor
pairingDesc: When accessing the Gateway via browser or WebSocket for the first time, you need to approve the device pairing by running openclaw devices approve <id> in the terminal. You can also manage pending pairings in the Nodes page.
gwStartingDesc: Installation complete, waiting for the gateway to start and checking port connectivity
gwStartTimeout: Gateway startup timed out (60s). Check logs or start manually.
gwStartFailedHint: Try again, or skip and start manually from Gateway Monitor
restartDesc: Installation completed, but environment variables are not yet effective.
restartSteps: All features will work normally after restart
restartReason: This is because newly installed programs need to update system environment variables.
installSuccessMsg: OpenClaw has been successfully installed and started!
installSuccessNote: Note: You are using the default configuration. Please go to Desktop -> Configurator later to enter your API Key to use AI features.
rootWarningDesc: Running OpenClaw as root is not recommended due to permission and security concerns.
rootSwitchUser: If you have another user, switch to it:
rootCreateUser: Or create a new user with sudo privileges:
rootThenReopen: After switching user, re-run the program:
sudoPasswordDesc: Your user requires a password for sudo commands. Enter your login password to proceed with installation.
zerotierManageHint: Go to ZeroTier Central to manage network access and authorization
tailscaleManageHint: Go to Tailscale Admin Console to login and configure Serve/Funnel
